pair.value: Send someone a task about this LMS
Write New Entry to Activity DSE
Write New Entry to Activity DSE
Write the entry activity to DB.

acp.name: recordActivity
acp.a:expr: =#"661ff9fe-1097-40a1-9b4a-9e616b63ead9_MAKEACTIVITYCDT"(recordId: pv!recordId,who: pv!assignee, action: if(pv!cancelTask, #"f8f54f93-1f62-4e95-a81d-b541f34bef33_ACTIONSKIPPED", #"2b2b6a9d-6dee-4a3f-a411-3e0ae7095563_ACTIONCOMPLETED"),taskAssigner: pp!initiator,taskDetails: pv!taskDetails, comments: pv!comments)

acp.name: Subject
acp.a:expr: =#"5e0c9ce1-8b2c-481f-9984-f27dd2542323_FORMATNAME"(pv!assignee) & if(pv!cancelTask, " skipped your task", " completed your task")

acp.name: BodyHTML
acp.a:expr:
=concatenate("

","You sent this task on " & pv!taskedOn & " with the following note: " & substitute(substitute(pv!taskDetails, char(10), "
"), char(13), "
"),"

 

",#"5e0c9ce1-8b2c-481f-9984-f27dd2542323_FORMATNAME"(pv!assignee) & if(pv!cancelTask, " skipped your task", " completed your task") & " with the following comment: ","

 

",substitute(substitute(pv!comments, char(10), "
"), char(13), "
"),"

")

uiExpressionForm.expression: =#"2ff67f6a-0580-4606-a7ff-8e3d8de82100_TASKFORM"( recordId: pv!recordId, taskDetails: pv!taskDetails, taskFrom: pv!taskFrom, taskedOn: pv!taskedOn, comments: ac!comments, cancel: ac!cancel )

pair.value: Write New Entry to Activity DSE
Write New Entry to Activity DSE
Write the entry activity to DB.

acp.name: recordActivity
acp.a:expr: =#"661ff9fe-1097-40a1-9b4a-9e616b63ead9_MAKEACTIVITYCDT"(recordId: pv!recordId,who: pp!initiator, action: #"_a-0000e394-8db7-8000-0bd6-01ef9001ef90_96583",taskAssignee: pv!assignee,taskDetails: pv!taskDetails, taskDeadline: pv!deadline)

uiExpressionForm.expression: =#"_a-0000e394-8db7-8000-0bd6-01ef9001ef90_96731"( assignee: pv!assignee, taskDetails: pv!taskDetails, deadline: pv!deadline, taskedOn: pv!taskedOn, taskFrom: pv!taskFrom, recordId: pv!recordId, cancel: pv!cancel )
